PHRASE.LANG: Hot can't describe you when you slip into these shoes. Get ready to hear every line in the book and love every minute of it. [#Legal]
Avec ces chaussures, vous serez plus que canon. Préparez-vous à vous faire accoster toutes les cinq minutes et à adorer ça. [#Legal]
In diesen Schuhen siehst du mehr als heiß aus. Du wirst jede Menge zu hören bekommen und jede Sekunde davon genießen. [#Legal]
Sarai a dir poco un bocconcino con queste scarpe addosso. Preparati a una storia a lieto fine che amerai da cima a fondo.[#Legal]
Que estás cañón será decir poco cuando te pongas estos zapatos. Prepárate a oír todos los piropos del mundo y a disfrutarlos, claro. [#Legal]
이 신발을 신은 당신에게 매력적이라는 표현은 너무 부족합니다. 사전에 있는 모든 좋은 표현들을 들으며, 듣는 동안 매 순간을 즐길 준비를 하세요.[#Legal]
Hot can't describe you when you slip into these shoes. Get ready to hear every line in the book and love every minute of it.[#Legal]
穿上這對鞋的話，連「火辣」一詞也不能盡表您的魅力。準備好傾聽書中的每一句，並鐘愛其每一分鐘。 [#Legal]
穿上這對鞋的話，連「火辣」一詞也不能盡表您的魅力。準備好傾聽書中的每一句，並鐘愛其每一分鐘。 [#Legal]
Hot can't describe you when you slip into these shoes. Get ready to hear every line in the book and love every minute of it.[#Legal]
